name: Chupaplex Chapter_0.1
description:
Chupaplex - Chapter_0.1

A prototype game created on a Jam with 2 other friends. The theme was to create a Supaplex-based game in 1 month, but no restrictions on creativity. You can find my friend's submission here.

As a result, Chupaplex combines a similar gameplay of Supaplex story with an ironic twist... :)

Controls

Space - Accept, eat without moving (hold), advance dialogs

Arrow keys - Movement

Mouse - Menu selections

Esc - Show cursor (when playing on web)

Note that the existence of a Chapter_0.1 doesn't imply a correlation with the existence of any other "Chapter_X" series.
